name: Self Sprint: A Notion Template
description: Introducing Self Sprint, the ultimate tool to help you become the best version of yourself by tracking and achieving your daily habits and challenges. With this template, you can easily add and manage your daily habit goals, making it effortless to stay on top of your personal growth journey. Designed to help users track and achieve their daily habits and challenges.Habit challenges to track progress towards goals related to: productivity fitness mindfulness, and more Self Sprint provides additi
